content: knit this light and delicate dotty beanie this worsted weight beanie uses the dot stitch which intersperses purl stitches among knit stitches for some gorgeous texture the dotty beanie has plenty of stretch with a slight slouch and is perfect for fall weather the pattern for the **duo-color dotty beanie** using two contrasting colors can be found **here** 1 ***note that the pdf 6 pages total includes all the step-by-step photos and two patterns dotty beanie & duo-color dotty beanie 1 https //www allaboutami com/duo-color-dotty-beanie-knit-pattern/
